meanings.definition: A type of fish that resembles a frog in appearance and behavior.
meanings.sent1: The frogfishes camouflage themselves among the coral reefs.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of frogfishes hopping along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The frogfishes decided to have a ribbiting contest with the frogs.
meanings.sent4: In the underwater world, the frogfishes are the masters of disguise.
meanings.sent5: The frogfishes' ability to blend in with their surroundings is truly remarkable.
